name: wilma Coordination Tasks
description: Active coordination tasks managed by wilma

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Please implement the following task cleanup cron job:

1. Deploy the task cleanup script to /usr/local/bin/task_cleanup.sh
2. Configure hourly cron job execution
3. Ensure proper logging to /var/log/task_cleanup.log
4. Set up log rotation for the cleanup logs

The cleanup script and SQL function have been created. This will help maintain system health by archiving stale tasks.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This is part of a system maintenance workflow to prevent accumulation of stale tasks. The SQL function cleanup_stale_tasks() has been created and tested.
